column2: You can choose a personal patron deity from among the many powerful gods and godesses of the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith.
I should dedicate myself to a particular deity and let their power inform my rule.
Zeus, father of gods and men.
Hades, lord of the underworld and its riches.
These are all powerful deities. Choosing one of them as my patron deity would be a testament to the power of my dynasty.
You can choose a personal patron from among the lesser gods of the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith.
Though they are lesser than Tengri, the power of these deities could well inform my rule.
Choosing any of these as a personal patron saint would be a testament to my piety.
You can choose a personal patron deity from among the many powerful gods and godesses of the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith.
I should dedicate myself to particular aspect of my religion, and let it benefit my rule.
